title: T206 McQuillan w/bat - DRUM Back SGC10 $1,100 OBO

posts.post_title: T206 McQuillan w/bat - DRUM Back SGC10 $1,100 OBO
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike Brailey
T206 McQuillan with rare DRUM back.  Back presents nicely, centered a bit to the right but entire design well within borders.  Relatively heavy horizontal crease that has broken the paper a bit on the back is primary reason for grade.  Still presents well if you're looking for a DRUM back.  A couple minor flakes of paper loss on front chest.  $1,100 or best offer.

Please contact me for scans at mikebrailey@yahoo.com

Thanks,
Mike
